net.co.java.packets

Class IncomingPacket

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.co.java.packets.IncomingPacket

  • public class IncomingPacket
extends java.lang.Object
    A wrapper providing methods to read unsigned values from the byte array from the Sockets' InputStream.
    Author:
    Jan-Willem Gmelig Meyling, Thomas Gmelig Meyling
